title: It takes a lot of help
creator_credit: John Peer Nugent and Core Communications Group
brief_description: Uses music by the Beatles, with narration by Lorne Greene, to explore the numerous avenues available to groups of citizens who are concerned with preventing drug abuse. Describes various of these avenues available both to the inidividual and communities combating drug abuse.
